resources.string:
The weekly mileage planner is a tool designed to help you plan out your training for the week and make sure you stay on top of it. Start by inputting a goal mileage for a given day. When you come back to the app on/after that the actual values will automatically be updated.

You can also find your time elapsed and elevation gained in the bottom left of each day. Want more detail tap on the link in the bottom right of a given day.

If you'd like to logout or change your units of measurements, simply tap your strava profile image in the top right of the screen.

string.name: help_about
string.u: Want to read more about this project? Tap here to read the post on Medium.
